code: export const ADD_CART_ITEM="@@cart/cartItemAdded";export const REMOVE_CART_ITEM="@@cart/cartItemRemoved";export const addCartItem=sku=>{return async dispatch=>({type:ADD_CART_ITEM,payload:{sku:sku}});};export const removeCartItem=(sku,quantity)=>{return async dispatch=>({type:REMOVE_CART_ITEM,payload:{sku:sku,quantity:quantity}});};
